HURRAY! HUZZAH! I got my #Vaccine! #COVID19 #Moderna #Walgreens #OnTime Didn't even feel the thin needle! #Science #ScienceWins #MarchForScience

Six weeks from now, I can hug someone again... #TOUCH #Hugs Visit with a friend & not freak out the entire time. #vaccinated https://t.co/ZqcGMjB8C8
